title: #288 - Mitchell Joachim, Co-Founder, Terreform ONE
itunes:title: #288 - Mitchell Joachim, Co-Founder, Terreform ONE
description:
This week David and Marina are joined by Mitchell Joachim, PhD, Associate Professor, NYU and Co-Founder, Terreform ONE to discuss the complexities of urban design; the role of the urban designer; the real-life applications of his research; financing projects; cricket farms; and more!

This episode is supported by Brizo • Monograph • Miele • Graphisoft

 •  Fellow Designer: Tips for designers.
